product_details.name: ASIAN Oxygen-01 Sports Running,Walking & Gym Shoes with Oxygen Technology Lightweight Casual Sneaker Shoes for Men's & Boy's
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 31 x 21 x 10 cm; 400 g. Country of Origin: India. Department: mens. Item Weight: 400 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 31 x 21 x 10 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Count. Generic Name: Sneaker. Customer Reviews: 3.8 3.8 out of 5 stars 4,408 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner showcases a modern and sporty design, ideal for promoting athletic footwear. The layout is divided vertically with a sleek gradient background transitioning from light grey to deep navy blue. On the left side, a dynamic background pattern includes curved golden lines and circular accents, giving a sense of motion and energy. A bold heading ("heading") in a futuristic font grabs attention at the top, followed by a supporting subheading ("subheading") indicating the product type. Beneath that, a bulleted features list ("description") provides key product benefits. The price section ("price") is prominently displayed in a bold style. A CTA button ("cta") in contrasting yellow with blue text encourages action. To the right, a product image ("product_image") is presented cleanly over a neutral section of the background.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1A237E
- Deep Blue: #0D1442
- Light Grey: #F5F5F5
- Medium Grey: #E0E0E0
- Golden Yellow: #FFD54F
- Charcoal Grey: #333333
product_color: The product image features a stylish pair of sneakers predominantly in navy blue (#121E3F), which provides a sleek and modern base tone. Accents of vibrant mustard yellow (#F6B024) are strategically placed on the logo, heel, and midsole, creating a sharp contrast that draws visual attention. Subtle charcoal black (#1E1E1E) and dark grey (#2C2F35) elements on the sole and eyelets offer depth and texture. A crisp white (#F4F4F4) portion of the midsole adds brightness, balancing the richness of darker hues. These complementary colors are smoothly blended, allowing key details to pop while maintaining a cohesive, athletic aesthetic perfect for banner design.
